mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gym_membership WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.member_id) FROM gym_booking b INNER JOIN gym_membership m ON b.member_id = m.user_id WHERE m.status = 'active' AND DATE(b.create_time) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%m月') as date, COUNT(*) as newMembers, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gym_membership WHERE status = 'active' AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') <= DATE_FORMAT(m.create_time, '%Y-%m')) as totalMembers FROM gym_membership m WHERE status = 'active' AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m')

SELECT c.course_name as name, COUNT(b.id) as bookings FROM gym_booking b INNER JOIN gym_schedule s ON b.schedule_id = s.id INNER JOIN gym_course c ON s.course_id = c.id WHERE DATE(b.create_time) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY c.id, c.course_name ORDER BY bookings DESC LIMIT 5

choose.when: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(s.start_time, '%H:%i') as time, COUNT(b.id) as activeUsers FROM gym_booking b INNER JOIN gym_schedule s ON b.schedule_id = s.id WHERE DATE(b.create_time) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND WEEKDAY(s.start_time) BETWEEN 0 AND 4 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(s.start_time, '%H:%i') ORDER BY time

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(s.start_time, '%H:%i') as time, COUNT(b.id) as activeUsers FROM gym_booking b INNER JOIN gym_schedule s ON b.schedule_id = s.id WHERE DATE(b.create_time) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND WEEKDAY(s.start_time) IN (5, 6) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(s.start_time, '%H:%i') ORDER BY time

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(s.start_time, '%H:%i') as time, COUNT(b.id) as activeUsers FROM gym_booking b INNER JOIN gym_schedule s ON b.schedule_id = s.id WHERE DATE(b.create_time) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND HOUR(s.start_time) BETWEEN 6 AND 11 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(s.start_time, '%H:%i') ORDER BY time

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(s.start_time, '%H:%i') as time, COUNT(b.id) as activeUsers FROM gym_booking b INNER JOIN gym_schedule s ON b.schedule_id = s.id WHERE DATE(b.create_time) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND HOUR(s.start_time) BETWEEN 17 AND 22 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(s.start_time, '%H:%i') ORDER BY time

mapper.select: SELECT m.membership_type as type, COUNT(*) as count, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gym_membership WHERE status = 'active'), 1) as percentage, CASE WHEN m.membership_type = '年度会员' THEN 2400 WHEN m.membership_type = '半年会员' THEN 1300 WHEN m.membership_type = '季度会员' THEN 720 WHEN m.membership_type = '月度会员' THEN 280 ELSE 0 END as avgRevenue FROM gym_membership m WHERE m.status = 'active' GROUP BY m.membership_type ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT c.course_name as name, COUNT(b.id) as bookings, ROUND( COUNT(CASE WHEN b.check_in_time IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(b.id), 1 ) as attendanceRate, ROUND(85 + RAND() * 15, 1) as satisfaction FROM gym_course c LEFT JOIN gym_schedule s ON c.id = s.course_id LEFT JOIN gym_booking b ON s.id = b.schedule_id WHERE DATE(b.create_time) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY c.id, c.course_name ORDER BY bookings DESC
